relation: We have planty of greek's to get involved with on campus. Before pledging make sure to look around at all of them

For fun on campus on nice days you see all the students on the mall playing kickball, sand volleyball or basketball. Another place we go is the underground, there is tv, food , and pool tables. Off campus we have movie theater , bowling alley and they were restoring the mini golf area when we were leaving. There are a lot of places to eat and hang out in town.
Food got better as the year went on and as we were told , suppose to improve next year.
The dorms are livable but need a little tlc. They are old .
We are known for academics , some of programs people come from all over just to be in.
Get as many scholarships as you can to help your parents out and so your loans aren't that high. And enjoy the campus.
The campus is beautiful , it is small and makes you feel like home. All the staff are very nice and do anything they can to help you.
pageTitle: Wilmington College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 07/13/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 1 of 24 Caitlyn from Saint Paris, OH Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: People in rural areas, great if you need to be at home. Bang for the buck I seem to be learning at a better rate that I would if I were in a classroom. What to do for fun Play around online. Checking out everything Miller-Motte has to offer. Food and Dining Eat whatever is in your refrigerator. Academic Rigor Its not that difficult at all. There are people there to assist you if you are experiencing any troubles. Tips for prospective students Don't procrastinate turning in your work. In three sentences Miller-Motte is an online school. It is user friendly, so anyone who has basic computer skills can attend. Login to rate or flag the reviews Frank from Dayton, OH 07/07/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 3 of 24
